org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.interceptor.message

Class MessageInterceptionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.interceptor.message.MessageInterceptionContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterceptionContext

    public class MessageInterceptionContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterceptionContext
    This defines the criteria of the interceptor, to filter the interceptor executions based on the current message context parameters such as the incoming transport, proxy service processing the message, sequence, endpoint and the current message flow, as to whether it is incoming (request) or outgoing (response)
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a message interception context with the following parameters

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getEndpoint()
      Gets the endpoint that is currently processing the message being intercepted
      FlowPoint getFlowPoint()
      Gets the interception flow point of the message
      FlowType getFlowType()
      Gets the flow type of the message, whether it is an incoming message or an outgoing message

      Gets the proxy service to which the message is received
      java.lang.String getSequence()
      Gets the sequence that is currently mediating the message being intercepted

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageInterceptionContext

        public MessageInterceptionContext(java.lang.String transport,
                          java.lang.String proxy,
                          java.lang.String sequence,
                          java.lang.String endpoint,
                          FlowType flowType,
                          FlowPoint flowPoint)
        Constructs a message interception context with the following parameters
        Parameters:
        transport - the transport over which the message is received
        proxy - the proxy service to which the message is received
        sequence - the sequence currently mediating the message
        endpoint - the endpoint currently processing the message
        flowType - the flow type, whether it is incoming or outgoing
        flowPoint - the flow point of the message interception

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        public boolean matches(InterceptionContext context)
        Checks whether this context matches the given context criteria. It is analogous to the String method String.matches(String) where the object on which the operation is called is considered the concrete object while the argument passed in is considered the criteria to be matched
        Specified by:
        matches in interface InterceptionContext
        Parameters:
        context - the context criteria to be matched
        Returns:
        true if this context matches the given criteria, false otherwise
